name: No time for charge
description:
No Time for Charge is a precision platformer runner game about a robot that never stops running forward. The game is a frenetic 2D platformer, featuring 16 challenging stages and a final boss. The story of the game follows a robot who is the hero of a city, and after a long day of neutralizing villains, receives a distress call from the laboratory. The robot's creator, Dr. Lam, is in danger, and there's no time for the robot to recharge its batteries to save him. Thus, the robot must collect and use disposable batteries found in the laboratory while having only 5 seconds of energy left in its charge. There are walls that only open when the robot discharges, so it must jump and bounce off walls to reach its goal before running out of energy.

Features:
  • 16 challenging stages to complete.
  • A final boss to defeat.
  • Frenetic 2D platformer gameplay.
  • The robot must use disposable batteries found in the laboratory to keep going.
  • Intense and precise gameplay that will test the player's skills.
Story: 

As the hero of the city, the robot never stops running forward to protect its citizens from villains. However, after a long day of fighting crime, the robot receives a distress call from the laboratory. Dr. Lam, the robot's creator, is in danger, and there's no time for the robot to recharge its batteries to save him. Thus, the robot must collect and use disposable batteries found in the laboratory to keep going. With only 5 seconds of energy left in its charge, the robot must bounce off walls and reach its destination before running out of energy. Can the robot save Dr. Lam in time?
